dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1562 IH: Test Strip Access Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Crockett (for herself and Mr. Gooden) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the 21st Century Cures Act to expressly authorize the use of certain grants to implement substance use disorder and overdose prevention activities with respect to fentanyl and xylazine test strips.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Test Strip Access Act of 2025.

section.header: Grant program for State and Tribal response to opioid use disorders
section.text: Section 1003(b)(4)(A) of the 21st Century Cures Act (42 U.S.C. 290eeâ€“3a(b)(4)(A)) is amended by inserting or fentanyl or xylazine test strips after which may include drugs or devices approved, cleared, or otherwise legally marketed under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
